nodes.text: Culan Brasli was a Human male who served as an enforcer for the Desilijic kajidic and knew how to maximize pain while minimizing long-term damage to those he interrogated. He had met Ghitsa Dogder several times during different circumstances before having to interrogate he aboard the Rook seeking information on Durga Besadii Tai's dealing for the Desilijic. After the rescue of Ghitsa by Fenig Nabon and Kyp Durron, Brasli was killed when the Rook took off and was destroyed.
